trans-unit.source: Animates from the <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value of the previous key frame to its own <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value" /> using splined interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 使用曲線插補，從上一個主要畫面格的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值繪製到其自有的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Decimal> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用做為一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrameCollection>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames>以動畫方式顯示<xref:System.Decimal>沿著一組主要畫面格的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格定義的區段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalAnimationUsingKeyFrames>其所屬。

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每個主要畫面格有 target<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的時間主要畫面格之<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DecimalKeyFrame.Value%2A>應該達到。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格以動畫顯示從上一個主要畫面格的目標值至它自己的目標值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 先前的主要畫面格結束，並在達到它自己的索引鍵時間時結束時啟動它。

trans-unit.source: Spline key frames like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame> creates a variable transition between values which is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 曲線主要畫面格喜歡<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame>會建立變數是由決定的值之間轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Splined interpolation can be used to achieve more realistic "real world" timing effects such as acceleration and deceleration.
trans-unit.target: 曲線插補，可用來達成更逼真 「 實際 」 時間效果加速減速等。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的結束值 (也稱為「目標值」)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的結束值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的結束值 (也稱為「目標值」)。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的 Key Time。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: Key Time 決定何時到達目標值，這也是主要畫面的結束時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定結束值和 Key Time，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的結束值 (也稱為「目標值」)。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的 Key Time。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: Key Time 決定何時到達目標值，這也是主要畫面的結束時間。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline" /> for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline" /> represents a Bezier curve which defines animation progress of the key frame.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline" /> 表示貝茲曲線，用來定義主要畫面格的動畫進度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value, key time, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的結束值、關鍵時間和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 要建立動畫的來源值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0.0 和 1.0 (含) 之間的值，指定這個主要畫面格經過的時間百分比。

trans-unit.source: Uses splined interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.
trans-unit.target: 使用曲線插補在先前的主要畫面格值與目前的主要畫面格值之間進行轉換。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 在指定基底值和漸次累加時，這個主要畫面格的輸出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the two control points that define animation progress for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定兩個控制點，這兩個控制點會定義這個主要畫面格的動畫進度。

trans-unit.source: The two control points that specify the cubic Bezier curve which defines the progress of the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點，指定用於定義主要畫面格進度的三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: To understand how a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A> works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A>運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 三次方貝茲曲線是由一個起始點、一個結束點和兩個控制點所定義。

trans-unit.source: The two coordinates in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A> defines those two control points.
trans-unit.target: 在兩個座標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A>定義這些兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points.
trans-unit.target: 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment.
trans-unit.target: 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。

trans-unit.source: To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineDecimalKeyFrame.KeySpline" /> 相依性屬性。
